plot: Bo and Tate resurface in Philadelphia where Bo is drawn toward a young woman and her husband, a blogger whose unrelenting pursuit of a mysterious story is threatening to tear the couple apart. Meanwhile, Skouras takes forceful action to track down a traitor within Orchestra.—Jiilo_Kim

Blogger/journalist Ben Wooten has received anonymous information about Project Orchestra, the government's plan to weaponize persons with telekinetic abilities. That news soon reaches Roman Skouras who orders one of his men to plug the leak. He also considers using Joshua who has unexpectedly developed the ability to target and destroy memory cells. Bo and Tate return to Philadelphia where Tate is hoping to catch up with the people who framed him for murder. Ben and his wife Taryn are their neighbors and Bo takes an immediate like to them. When Skouras' henchman arrive, they all manage to escape. When Ben goes to meet his anonymous source, Lucas is waiting for him.—garykmcd
